Dr.techn. Born 1953-01-23 in Leibnitz, Austria Married 1981-06-09 (no children) Citizenship Austrian Education and Honors 1994 FELLOW of the IAPR. 1991 Habilitation [61] on Image Pyramids and Curves from Univ. Innsbruck. 1982 Dr.techn. (PhD) on Registration of Satellite Images with Maps [9] from Technical University in Graz, advisor: Johannes Moik. 1976 Maître d'Informatique from University of Grenoble. Accomplishments since 2009 Scientific Advisory Board of the Computer Vision Center (CVC) Barcelona, Spain. 2004-2006 President of the International Association for Pattern Recognition 2000-2007 Kplus Competence Center on 'Advanced Computer Vision' 1990-2021 Full Professor and director of PRIP (Pattern Recognition and Image Processing) at Vienna University of Technology. . Before research positions at Center for Automation Research, University of Maryland, USA; University of Innsbruck, A; sabbaticals in Lyon, Reims, Poitiers, Bordeaux (F), Toronto (Can), Purdue Univ. (USA), Sevilla (Spain). Created by Bernhard Mecl; Last updated: October 8, 2025
